contentList.content: Emanating a warm, golden glow, the blade seems to hold the very light of the heavens. The leather-bound hilt feels as steadfast and reassuring as the god of law's embrace. Its surface is marked with radiant runes and the inscription, "By Tyr's Will, Justice Prevails."

The wielder's senses are sharpened by the divine wisdom of Tyr, enabling them to discern deceit and judge intentions with unparalleled clarity. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Insight">Insight</LSTag> checks.

When hit by an attack, the wielder can use their <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag> to compel the attacker to make a Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> (DC 16). On a failed save, the attacker takes [1] as divine justice exacts its toll.

Once per long rest the wielder can call upon the protective power of Tyr to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_WardingBond">Warding Bond</LSTag>.
